import "./Menu.css" import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faBars } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { faShoppingCart } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { faTimes } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import axios from "axios" export default function Menu(){ const [categories, setCategories] = useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ const fetchdata = async()=>{ const result = await axios('http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/categories/') setCategories(result.data) } fetchdata() }, []) return( <>
